瑵字的基本解释

瑵
zhǎo
古代车盖弓头伸出像爪的部分，多用金玉做装饰：“莽乃造华盖九重，高八丈一尺，金瑵羽葆。”

瑵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǎo］
［《廣韻》側絞切，上巧，莊。］
古代车盖弓端伸出的爪形部分。一般以玉为饰。

瑵字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑵； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页740第07
【唐韻】【集韻】?側絞切，音爪。【說文】車蓋玉瑵。【前漢·王莽傳】金瑵羽葆。【師古註】瑵，讀曰爪。謂蓋弓頭爲爪形。【張衡·東京賦】葩瑵曲莖。【註】瑵，音爪。葩瑵，悉以金作華形，莖皆曲也。　又【廣韻】玉名。　【集韻】或作釽。

瑵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瑵字的起名意思

暂无。

瑵
Basic explanation of words
瑵
zhǎo
The claw-like part of the arch of the ancient car cover is mostly decorated with gold and jade: "Mang is a nine-fold canopy, eight feet high and one foot high, Jin Yuyubao."
瑵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǎo］
["Guangyun" side-cut, Qiao, Zhuang. ]
The claw-shaped part that protrudes from the bow end of an ancient car cover. Generally decorated with jade.
瑵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瑵; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 740 Page 07
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Side twisting, sound claw. [Said the text] Car cover jade. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] Jin Yuyubao. [Shi Gu's Note] 瑵, read claws. The head of the cover bow is claw-shaped. 【Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu】The curly stems of Po瑵. [Note] 瑵, sound claw. The flower shape is made of gold, and the stems are all curved.　[Guangyun] Yuming.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo.
瑵
